predicate.note: Frames file for 'coevolve' based on sentences in ULA Written. Comparison with 'evolve' and 'co-author'. No VerbNet entry for 'coevolve,' 'evolve' is VN class 26.2, 48.1.1.

role.descr: other thing changed with, when separate mention

example.name: end state, things changing one mention
example.text: They coevolve under our rapt gaze over months or years into a modestly complex ecosystem brimming with novel life forms.
example.arg: into a modestly complex ecosystem brimming with novel life forms
